import{useContext,Fragment}from'react';import{CategoriesContext}from'../../components/contexts/categories.context';import CategoryPreview from'../../components/category-preview/category-preview.component';/* 
  Object.keys() returns an array whose elements are strings corresponding to the enumerable properties found directly upon object .

  ["hats", "jackets", "mens", "sneakers", "womens"]
*/import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CategoriesPreview=function CategoriesPreview(){var _useContext=useContext(CategoriesContext),categoriesMap=_useContext.categoriesMap;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:Object.keys(categoriesMap).map(function(title){var products=categoriesMap[title];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryPreview,{title:title,products:products},title);})});};export default CategoriesPreview;
